channel.title: How Do I make npc's drop stuff? PLease HELP
channel.description:
Ohkay guys..Please tell me how to make npcs drop stuff.. I think you have to go to npcdrops.cnf.. But Then Idk Because it says the name of the npc then what it drops..BUT..How do the server read the name..Wouldn't I have to put the id of the npc
Like I just added spirit beast and I want it to drop really good stuff..
Help?

item.title: How Do I make npc's drop stuff? PLease HELP
item.dc:creator: @Tension_Ltd Tension Ltd
item.description:
@Tension_Ltd wrote:

you go into the npcdrops file and add a drop . there are 3 steps.
1.) you have to put the monster id
2.) then the item id
3.) then the percent out of a 100 that the item would drop
for example if you wanted the item to drop 50% of the time you would write 50% not 50/100%
Also space the id’s out by the tab buttons or it will be an error.

Hope I helped

Ty - Tension Ltd

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I make npc's drop stuff? PLease HELP
